name: Explorer Eve
description:
As a Archaeologist, you've fall into a world that watched by a witch.

Who's cursed cannot move for thousand years but able to manipulate time and telekinesis.

You must help her to retrieve the relics to set her free

from the curse and she will helping you to solve things that you can't manage.

-ASDW to move

-Mouse to look around

-Space to jump.

-Shift to walk.

-C to Crouch.
